description: additional materials. Included are: a bibliography of scholarly work on finding, identifying, and studying Greek and Roman amphoras and the trade they carried passages in ancient Greek literature on the use of amphoras (quoted in English). translations into English of works (or parts of works) published in Russian on amphoras links to other Web sites with amphora information and/or images (excavations, wrecks, etc) and other sources of bibliography searches of the bibliography files and the text of other files. Use '@' for and, '.' for any letter (wr.ck@mahdia): see Notes on searching.
title: additional materials
